attributes.action: UK government to make America understand benefits of vaping as smoking cessation
attributes.additional_details: At the last count, at least 9 states have- or are in the process of- banning flavoured e liquids and announced that carrying these would incur criminal charges
attributes.background: The US government have been moving nationally to ban flavoured vape liquids which have helped countless Americans to give up smoking, this is a potential health threat to millions of smokers looking to improve their quality of life by making vaping less appealing
